channel.title: [PI]Custom capes aren't part of your character
channel.description:
The capes: Wings of Saradomin Death Wings of Anarchy Wings of Life Angel Wings
Aren't attached to my character. What i mean is that they are basically floating models in the air. To make myself a little more clear, when i make my character "fly" (For some its the ::god command, or maybe the ring of flying) the cape just stays in its old spot and not on the characters back. Any help?
If you're not going to help, don't post.

item.title: [PI]Custom capes aren't part of your character
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

thock321:

If you’re not going to help, don’t post.

There’s a reason why this is called Client “Help”. And if there are guides on other forums, and you posted here to “help” then you should atleast give me a link?

EDIT: Oh lol i just realized you had to post this stuff in the model help section. Someone move this? Ill just repost tho

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]Custom capes aren't part of your character

item.title: [PI]Custom capes aren't part of your character
item.dc:creator: @Smallboy Smallboy
item.description:
@Smallboy wrote:

Deltascape:

First of all there are guides in the forums were you can search plus im sure there are people in moparscape that can help you i suggest you lock this topic and ask help from coders.

lol your a joke , he dont have to lock the topic . thats why its call Client help -.-
